name: Furby Koh Koh 2
description: It has been weeks since Koh Koh had encountered Goth and his henchmen but little does Koh Koh know that this is just the beginning as Goth strikes again but with a new right hand man who is also a furby just like Koh Koh named Icey and both Icey and Goth take the Harmony Crystal and it's up to Koh Koh and her new friend Orangey Pie to get it back and destroy Goth and his Empire once more!
